page.title: 20Ringmer and the Christies
page.content:
The{Christie family}of{Glyndebourne} have long and close associations with Ringmer. John Christie, founder of {Glyndebourne Opera,}provided much needed local employment by constructing a{forge, building works} and a{garage.}A feature of Ringmer is the attractive row of{cottages}built by Christie for his estate, opera and domestic workers. The large playing field behind the two schools was a gift from Mr.John Christie in 1923.
These pages written and compiled by the children of Ringmer County Primary School and Villagers. { {Addendum}: In August 1985, Ringmer won the Best Kept Village Competition (Two Counties Championship, East and West Sussex).
